abstract: Quiznos, the sandwich shop chain, named Gregory D. Brenneman, a turnaround expert who is credited with revitalizing Burger King and Continental Airlines, president and chief executive on Monday. Mr. Brenneman’s private equity firm, TurnWorks, has also taken an equity stake in Quiznos, the company said, although it did not disclose financial details.
lead_paragraph: Quiznos, the sandwich shop chain, named Gregory D. Brenneman, a turnaround expert who is credited with revitalizing Burger King and Continental Airlines, president and chief executive on Monday. Mr. Brenneman’s private equity firm, TurnWorks, has also taken an equity stake in Quiznos, the company said, although it did not disclose financial details.

headline.main: Turnaround Expert Is Named Quiznos Chief
